languages.text: "Мы откроем храм тем из паствы, кто желает служить флагману и Неумирающему. Умножимся числом. Воспитаем бойцов. Разделим с блюстителями их долг, закалим их своими умениями. Отринем удел обороны своих владений, чтобы пойти в атаку. Мы перестанем быть незримыми стражами, но станем солдатами Его. И твоими, Домин'{name}".

traits.locale_text: "Отныне двери храма смерти открыты для всех, кто желает служить флагману и Неумирающему. Отныне мы перестанем быть незримыми стражами. И сольемся с блюстителями — их сила и наши умения закалят кровь и дух корабля. Мы станем кровавыми смотрителями. Теми, кто будет достоин служит тебе, Эним'{name}".

languages.text: "We will open the temple to those among our congregation who wish to serve the flagship and the Undying One. We will grow our numbers. We will train fighters. We will share the enforcers' duty and fortify them with our skills. We will shun defending our grounds in confinement, and go on the offensive. We will no longer be unseen guardians, but will become His soldiers. And yours, Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "Мы откроем храм тем из паствы, кто желает служить флагману и Неумирающему. Умножимся числом. Воспитаем бойцов. Разделим с блюстителями их долг, закалим их своими умениями. Отринем удел обороны своих владений, чтобы пойти в атаку. Мы перестанем быть незримыми стражами, но станем солдатами Его. И твоими, Домин'{name}".

traits.locale_text: "We will open the temple to those among our congregation who wish to serve the flagship and the Undying One. We will gain in numbers. We will train fighters. We will share the enforcers' duty with them and fortify them with our skills. We will shun our confinement to defending our turf, and go on the offensive. We will no longer be unseen guardians; we will become His soldiers. And yours, Enim'{name}."

"We will open the temple to those among our congregation who wish to serve the flagship and the Undying One. We will gain in numbers. We will train fighters. We will share the enforcers' duty with them and fortify them with our skills. We will shun our confinement to defending our turf, and go on the offensive. We will no longer be unseen guardians; we will become His soldiers. And yours, Enim'{name}."

"We will open the temple to those among our congregation who wish to serve the flagship and the Undying One. We will grow our numbers. We will train fighters. We will share the enforcers' duty and fortify them with our skills. We will shun defending our turf in confinement, and go on the offensive. We will no longer be unseen guardians, but will become His soldiers. And yours, Domin'{name}."

"We will open the temple to those among our congregation who wish to serve the flagship and the Undying One. We will grow our numbers. We will train fighters. We will share the enforcers' duty and fortify them with our skills. We will shun defending our turf in confinement, and go on the offensive. We will no longer be unseen guardians, but will become His soldiers. And yours, Domin'{name}."

"We will open the temple to those among our congregation who wish to serve the flagship and the Undying One. We will grow our numbers. We will train fighters. We will share the enforcers' duty and fortify them with our skills. We will shun defending our grounds in confinement, and go on the offensive. We will no longer be unseen guardians, but will become His soldiers. And yours, Domin'{name}."

"We will open the temple to those among our congregation who wish to serve the flagship and the Undying One. We will grow our numbers. We will train fighters. We will share the enforcers' duty and fortify them with our skills. We will shun defending our grounds in confinement, and go on the offensive. We will no longer be unseen guardians, but will become His soldiers. And yours, Domin'{name}."

languages.text: « Nous ouvrirons les portes du temple aux membres de notre congrégation qui veulent servir le vaisseau amiral et l'Immortel. Nous gonflerons nos rangs. Nous formerons des combattants. Nous soulagerons les prévôts d'une partie de leur devoir et nous renforcerons ces braves avec nos compétences. Nous arrêterons de nous retrancher, invisibles, nous passerons plutôt à l'offensive. Nous ne serons plus des gardiens tapis dans l'ombre, car nous deviendrons Ses soldats. Et les vôtres, Domin'{name}. »
languages.original_text: "We will open the temple to those among our congregation who wish to serve the flagship and the Undying One. We will grow our numbers. We will train fighters. We will share the enforcers' duty and fortify them with our skills. We will shun defending our grounds in confinement, and go on the offensive. We will no longer be unseen guardians, but will become His soldiers. And yours, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ouvrirons les portes du temple aux membres de notre congrégation qui veulent servir le vaisseau amiral et l'Immortel. Nous gonflerons nos rangs. Nous formerons des combattants. Nous soulagerons les prévôts d'une partie de leur devoir et nous renforcerons ces braves avec nos compétences. Nous arrêterons de nous retrancher, invisibles, nous passerons plutôt à l'offensive. Nous ne serons plus des gardiens tapis dans l'ombre, car nous deviendrons Ses soldats. Et les vôtres, Domin'{name}. »

languages.text: «Abriremos el templo a los miembros de nuestra congregación que quieran servir a la nave insignia y al Inmortal. Creceremos en número. Entrenaremos a nuevos guerreros. Compartiremos el deber de la seguridad y los haremos más fuertes con nuestras habilidades. Defenderemos nuestro territorio, terminaremos nuestro confinamiento y pasaremos a la ofensiva. Ya no seremos guardianes invisibles, sino Sus soldados. Y los suyos también, Domin'{name}».
languages.original_text: "We will open the temple to those among our congregation who wish to serve the flagship and the Undying One. We will grow our numbers. We will train fighters. We will share the enforcers' duty and fortify them with our skills. We will shun defending our grounds in confinement, and go on the offensive. We will no longer be unseen guardians, but will become His soldiers. And yours, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: «Abriremos el templo a los miembros de nuestra congregación que quieran servir a la nave insignia y al Inmortal. Creceremos en número. Entrenaremos a nuevos guerreros. Compartiremos el deber de la seguridad y los haremos más fuertes con nuestras habilidades. Defenderemos nuestro territorio, terminaremos nuestro confinamiento y pasaremos a la ofensiva. Ya no seremos guardianes invisibles, sino Sus soldados. Y los suyos también, Domin'{name}».

languages.text: 「旗艦と不死の者に仕えたいと願う信徒たちに、神殿を開放します。我々の数を増やし、戦士たちを訓練します。エンフォーサーの任務を分かち合い、我々の技術で彼らを鍛えましょう。閉じこもって守ることはしないで、積極的に前に出ます。我らはもう姿の見えない守護者ではなく、あの方の兵士となるのですから。そしてあなた様の兵士でもあります、ドミン・{name}」
languages.original_text: "We will open the temple to those among our congregation who wish to serve the flagship and the Undying One. We will grow our numbers. We will train fighters. We will share the enforcers' duty and fortify them with our skills. We will shun defending our grounds in confinement, and go on the offensive. We will no longer be unseen guardians, but will become His soldiers. And yours, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: 「旗艦と不死の者に仕えたいと願う信徒たちに、神殿を開放します。我々の数を増やし、戦士たちを訓練します。エンフォーサーの任務を分かち合い、我々の技術で彼らを鍛えましょう。閉じこもって守ることはしないで、積極的に前に出ます。我らはもう姿の見えない守護者ではなく、あの方の兵士となるのですから。そしてあなた様の兵士でもあります、ドミン・{name}」

languages.text: “我们准备敞开圣殿大门，吸纳那些愿意侍奉旗舰、侍奉不死之神的成员加入我们。我们准备扩大规模，训练新的战士。我们会分享执法者的职责，向他们传授我们的技艺。我们不再闭门自守，而要主动出击。我们不再是看不见的守卫，而会成为祂的战士，也是你的战士，秘者{name}。”
languages.original_text: "We will open the temple to those among our congregation who wish to serve the flagship and the Undying One. We will grow our numbers. We will train fighters. We will share the enforcers' duty and fortify them with our skills. We will shun defending our grounds in confinement, and go on the offensive. We will no longer be unseen guardians, but will become His soldiers. And yours, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: “我们准备敞开圣殿大门，吸纳那些愿意侍奉旗舰、侍奉不死之神的成员加入我们。我们准备扩大规模，训练新的战士。我们会分享执法者的职责，向他们传授我们的技艺。我们不再闭门自守，而要主动出击。我们不再是看不见的守卫，而会成为祂的战士，也是你的战士，秘者{name}。”

languages.text: "Wir werden den Tempel für alle Mitglieder unserer Gemeinde öffnen, die dem Flaggschiff und dem Todlosen dienen wollen. Wir werden unsere Zahl mehren. Wir werden Kämpfer ausbilden. Wir werden die Enforcer in ihren Aufgaben unterstützen und sie durch unsere Fähigkeiten stärken. Wir werden unser Reich nicht mehr als Gefangene verteidigen, sondern in die Offensive gehen. Wir werden nicht länger unsichtbare Wächter sein, sondern zu seinen Soldaten werden. Und zu den Euren, Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "We will open the temple to those among our congregation who wish to serve the flagship and the Undying One. We will grow our numbers. We will train fighters. We will share the enforcers' duty and fortify them with our skills. We will shun defending our grounds in confinement, and go on the offensive. We will no longer be unseen guardians, but will become His soldiers. And yours, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden den Tempel für alle Mitglieder unserer Gemeinde öffnen, die dem Flaggschiff und dem Todlosen dienen wollen. Wir werden unsere Zahl mehren. Wir werden Kämpfer ausbilden. Wir werden die Enforcer in ihren Aufgaben unterstützen und sie durch unsere Fähigkeiten stärken. Wir werden unser Reich nicht mehr als Gefangene verteidigen, sondern in die Offensive gehen. Wir werden nicht länger unsichtbare Wächter sein, sondern zu seinen Soldaten werden. Und zu den Euren, Domin'{name}."

languages.text: "Cemaatimiz içinden sancak gemisine ve Ölmeyen'e hizmet etmek isteyenlere tapınağı açacağız. Sayımızı artıracağız. Dövüşçüler yetiştireceğiz. İnfazcıların vazifelerini paylaşıp yeteneklerimizle onları güçlendireceğiz. Bize ait alanları savunurken kendimizi hapsetmekten kaçınarak doğruca hücuma geçeceğiz. Artık görünmez muhafızlar olmak yerine O'nun ve senin askerleriniz olacağız Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "We will open the temple to those among our congregation who wish to serve the flagship and the Undying One. We will grow our numbers. We will train fighters. We will share the enforcers' duty and fortify them with our skills. We will shun defending our grounds in confinement, and go on the offensive. We will no longer be unseen guardians, but will become His soldiers. And yours, Domin'{name}."
